publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-636# Alex Neil: Pensions—That the Parliament considers that Her Majesty’s Government should re-establish the link between retirement pensions and the annual increase in wages.

S2M-636# Alex Neil: Pensions-That the Parliament considers that Her Majesty's Government should re-establish the link between retirement pensions and the annual increase in wages. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-636# Pensions (lodged on 20 November 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-636# Pensions (lodged on 20 November 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-636# Pensions (lodged on 20 November 2003) John Swinburne*
S2M-636# Pensions (lodged on 20 November 2003) Elaine Smith*, Christine Grahame*, Rosie Kane*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-636# Pensions (lodged on 20 November 2003) Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-636# Pensions (lodged on 20 November 2003) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-636# Pensions (lodged on 20 November 2003) Brian Adam*
